title: Computer blue screen of death after every game end
body: After every game end, win, loss, howling abyss, summoners rift, training, my computer will shortly crash with the blue screen of death with the error (THREAD_STUCK_IN_DEVICE_DRIVER) This only happens with League, and it's been happening for a month now, and it's extremely frustrating. I've updated my drives, graphics, changed compatibility mode, run as administrator, reset my computer, etc, and nothing has worked. I've searched online and done everything and nothing has worked, so now I go to forums.

replies.body: There might be a more serious issue here like hardware failure if you're crashing into a blue screen.  It could also just be overheating, so definitely double check your vents to make sure there's solid airflow.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well so our tech team can help you directly to find some options.  See you there!
